metadata.name: Double Pain
metadata.description:
• Passive • Take double damage. That's it. • Can give Paper Isaac transformation • Repentance and multiplayer support
This is a (more or less) objectively bad joke item based on the Paper Mario badge of the same name. All it does is double the damage you take. But it also counts toward the Paper Isaac transformation, so it's not [i]completely[/i] bad.
[u]Item Pools[/u] • None, by default • Can be added to the Treasure Room pool with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1603631350]Mod Config Menu[/url]
[u]Transformation[/u] • Paper Isaac
This item is also included in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1826418847]Paper Isaac modpack[/url].
